projects.title: Echo Trails
projects.description: Create an interactive platform to explore Nordic countries, featuring cities, landmarks, and historical information.
keyFeatures: Integration with Firebase NoSQL real-time database to manage and synchronize user-generated and static content.
Utilized a local JSON database for fallback and offline capabilities.
Firebase Authentication implemented for secure user login and registration.

projects.title: Educational Management System
projects.description: Build a centralized system to track university data.
keyFeatures: Backend developed with Java Spring Boot, providing secure API endpoints
Separate deployment of backend (Render) and frontend (Firebase) for scalability
Local JSON database used for lightweight data storage and testing
RESTful APIs for real-time communication with the frontend
Collaborative group project

projects.title: Android Application 'Jokes On You'
projects.description: Create an Android app using a RESTful API for daily casual use.
keyFeatures: Connection to 'Jokes' RESTful API
7 activities
Callbacks: onSaveInstanceState(), onRestoreInstanceState()
All strings translated to two languages (Spanish, Finnish)

projects.title: Neural Networks Training
projects.description: Train a multiclass ANN to accurately predict raisin classes using raisin data.
keyFeatures: Data scaling
Neural network training and testing
Confusion matrix and accuracy score

projects.title: Sorting and Searching Program
projects.description: Implement a program that focuses on efficient sorting and searching algorithms.
keyFeatures: Emphasis on sorting and searching algorithms
Optimized with time complexities of O(nÂ²) and O(nlog(n))

projects.title: Forecast Application
projects.description: Develop a forecast application that fetches and displays recent weather data from TAMK API.
keyFeatures: Connection to TAMK weather database API
Fetching and displaying data in tables sorted by dates and weather types
Visualization data with Gantt charts and graphs

projects.title: Drone Fleet Management System
projects.description: Manage a fleet of drones for operations, with a focus on food delivery services.
keyFeatures: Drone Management (add, update, delete, and view drones in the fleet)
In-memory Data Storage
Usage of Spring Boot library

projects.title: Profile Website
projects.description: Build a responsive website using React, focused on delivering a seamless user experience.
keyFeatures: Utilizes React libraries for enhanced functionality
Fully responsive design for smooth user experience

projects.title: Grading Program
projects.description: Create a program to evaluate students, collect their information, calculate final grades, and allow sorting of student lists.
keyFeatures: Calculates final grades based on a weighted formula
Provides sorting options by final grade or name using bubble sort algorithm
Displays filled forms with students' details and calculated grades

projects.title: Java Backend Registration Page (IN PROGRESS)
projects.description: Implement email-based user registration for a webpage.
keyFeatures: Development with Spring Boot
Focus on security for user registration
PostgreSQL used for database management
Email-based registration system for user authentication and verification
